disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your VTEX store
disconnected.subtitle: Enter the following data from your VTEX store to connect it with Doppler. Therefore, you can automatically synchronize your contacts and also add the products of your store into your Emails using the Template Editor. Do you have any doubts? Press
disconnected.app_key_placeholder: Enter your VTEX store App Key
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with Vtex please try again later.

connected.title: Synchronize data entities with Subscriber Lists
connected.subtitle_list_count: You currently have {{availableLists}} Lists. Be aware that you can sync Lists manually whenever you want.
connected.subtitle: Select the VTEX entity and the Doppler List you wish to synchronize. Contacts belonging to that entity will be automatically imported into the List.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: If you disconnect, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your Vtex account and the Automations associated with the integration will be paused. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Take benefit of the data from your contacts in other apps to expand your Doppler list. If you canâ€™t find the same field among the options you can personalize it or omit it.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.
